alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; DuPage; Southern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 9:07PM CST until March 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total wet snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Freezing drizzle or light freezing rain with ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. * WHERE...DuPage, and Central and Southern Cook Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief snowfall rates of one inch per hour are possible between midnight and 3 AM. The snow may briefly change to freezing drizzle in the 4 to 8 AM window.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
